name: Riffle Effect (itch)
description:
Ripple Effect is a game that combines a barrage game and a TPS game.

Riffle Effect is a stylish action game that fights by changing the view.

Avoid enemy attacks at a wide point of view and switch to TPS to attack enemy!

Features
  1. To fight by switching views.
  2. Cute Cartoon graphics
  3. a variety of productions
DownLoad the Demo version!
